Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value in its category. I believe it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a piece that is not only cost-effective but also significantly adds to its perceived value. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
